duties: Project Development: Participated in the creation of 5 individual and 3 team projects focused on developing web applications using JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.​

Leadership and Process Management: Fulfilled the roles of Team Lead and Scrum Master in team projects, including project organization, task distribution, project setup, development process management, and implementation of Agile methodologies
Adoption of New Technologies: Studied and applied new libraries and technologies, optimizing code to enhance performance and efficiency​

Team Collaboration and Communication: Maintained constant communication with peers, assisted in resolving issues and bugs, and interacted with the mentor on behalf of the team to discuss technical solutions
GitHub Management: Reviewed and conducted code reviews for all team members, ensuring code quality and adherence to project standards.
